item.title: Introduction of Yings for macOS
item.description: Overview Yings is a proxy utility which used shadowsocks, shadowsocks is a secure socks5 proxy, designed to protect your internet traffic. Features Super Fast and secured with industry level encryption algorithm. Suports auto mode and global mode With eight built-in proxy servers, more proxy servers will be available soon. No registration and login, easy to use. The difference of Auto Mode and Global Mode Auto Mode: You know some websites is blocked in some country.

item.title: Privacy Policy of Yings
item.description: Yings is a proxy utility which used shadowsocks, shadowsocks is a secure socks5 proxy, designed to protect your internet traffic. Data Collection Yings is just a proxy tool that provides network acceleration. We will not collect any of your information. In order to improve product quality, we provide email feedback function, if you have any suggestions, you can send us an email. This email content is only used to help us communicate and improve product quality, we will not use it anywhere else.

item.title: Introduction of Secnettool for macOS
item.description: What is VPN? A VPN, or virtual private network, is a secure tunnel between two or more devices. VPNs are used to protect private web traffic from snooping, interference, and censorship. What is Secnettool? Secnettool is an IPsec VPN App, which encrypts your network traffic, so that nobody between you and the VPN server can eavesdrop on your data as it travels via the Internet. This is especially useful when using unsecured networks, e.

item.title: Privacy Policy of Secnettool
item.description: The Privacy Policy Secnettool keeps no logs which enable interference with your IP address, the moment or content of your data traffic. We make express reference to the fact that we do not record in logs communication contents or data regarding the accessed websites or the IP addresses . Install & Updates We have the right to install certificates and future updates at any time without any notice. Changes We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time.

item.title: About
item.description: Overview Secnettool is an IPsec VPN Client, which encrypts your network traffic, so that nobody between you and the VPN server can eavesdrop on your data as it travels via the Internet. This is especially useful when using unsecured networks, e.g. at coffee shops, airports or hotel rooms. Contact Email: secnettool@gmail.com Twitter: https://twitter.com/secnettool
